thread.title: Kim Kardashian Spotted Visiting Maternity Ward in San Fransisco
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian Spotted Visiting Maternity Ward in San Fransisco

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Kim Kardashian Spotted Visiting Maternity Ward in San Fransisco
text:
Comments The 'Keeping Up with the Kardashians' star paid a visit to a maternity ward at a Bay Area hospital over the weekend. 
Kim Kardashian was spotted visiting a maternity ward at a Bay Area hospital while she was on trip to San Fransisco over the weekend. According to X17 Online , Kim stayed at the hospital for twenty minutes and everything looked fine despite her recent concern on gestational diabetes. Following the hospital stop, Kim went for a full-on shopping spree in the city. The " Keeping Up with the Kardashians " star wore a black leather coat paired with a sheer turtleneck top and long skirt. She styled her hair in sleek updo. In a season 11 promo of "KUWTK", Kim was told by a doctor during a check-up, "Once you have preeclampsia, you're at risk of having it again." She then told her mom Kris Jenner and sister Kourtney Kardashian , "They saw more fluid than normal in my placenta, which could mean I have diabetes." On Sunday, Kim was seen ditching her high heels for something more comfortable during an outing with her family. Kanye West 's wife wore a flat sneakers while heading out on a wine safari in Malibu, California. She later took to Instagram to post a photo of her and Kourtney posing with a giraffe.  A photo posted by Kim Kardashian West (@kimkardashian) on Oct 12, 2015 at 4:26pm PDT
